# Intellectual Property Protections for Data Scientists

### About our Presenter

Beau Walker is a passionate data science entrepreneur and inventor with a focus on IP-driven companies. His diverse career encompasses the creation of innovative products and solutions across eCommerce, advertising technology, healthcare, finance, and real estate, holding patents in many of these fields. As a data scientist at heart, he specializes in a range of areas from AI and machine learning to data architecture and visualization, driven by his background in ecology and evolutionary biology, with a keen interest in bio-inspired algorithms.

Beau is the Founder & Chief Data Scientist at Method Data Science and is the Chief Technology Officer at Obsidian Insurance Group.
